data.title: Weekly Construction Update Homepage
data.meta_description: Work Between Friday, August 2, to Friday, August 16, 2024 The 2024 Paving Plan is published on the PaveDC website at the start of the construction season. The website also includes separate tabs for sidewalks scheduled for repair and the Alley Restoration Plan for Fiscal Year 2024.
data.text:
Work Between Friday, August 2, to Friday, August 16, 2024

The 2024 Paving Plan is published on the PaveDC website at the start of the construction season. The website also includes separate tabs for sidewalks scheduled for repair and the Alley Restoration Plan for Fiscal Year 2024.

Please note: Work may be adjusted depending on weather and other conditions, and additional projects may be added to this list. DDOT contacts residents and businesses within the work zones before work begins. Unless otherwise noted, work is not conducted on weekends.

Citywide Pavement Restoration Projects

DDOT is committed to improving and restoring local roadways through pavement restoration. Residents should expect paving activities at the following locations over the next two weeks, weather permitting:

Ward 2

K Street NW between 9th Street NW and 20th Street NW

Rhode Island Avenue NW between Bataan Street NW and 17th Street NW

Virginia Avenue NW between 21st Street NW and D Street NW

Wisconsin Avenue NW between K Street NW/Water Street NW and M Street NW

Ward 3

Tilden Street NW between Connecticut Avenue NW and Shoemaker Street NW

Ward 4

16th Street NW between Alaska Avenue NW and Nicholson Street NW

Georgia Avenue NW and Aspen Street NW

Georgia Avenue NW between Fern Place NW and Geranium Street NW

Western Avenue NW between Pinehurst Circle NW and Stuyvesant Place NW

Ward 5

Rhode Island Avenue NE between 4th Street NE and 14th Street NE/ Montana Avenue NE

South Dakota Avenue NE between V Street NE and Vista Street NE

Ward 6

2nd Street NE between C Street NE and Maryland Avenue NE/ Constitution Avenue NE

2nd Street NE between F Street NE and E Street NE

K Street NW between 1st Street NW and New Jersey Avenue NW

Citywide Sidewalk Restoration Projects

As part of DDOT's commitment to improving and restoring local sidewalks, construction activities will occur at the following locations throughout the next two weeks.

Ward 4

Webster Street NW between 5th Street NW and Illinois Avenue NW

Ward 5

12th Street NE between Perry Street NE and Quincy Street NE

14th Street NE between Ritchie Place NE and Shepherd Street NE

30th Street NE between Evarts Street NE and Franklin Street NE

Allison Street NE between Hawaii Avenue NE and Rock Creek Church Road NW

Bladensburg Rd NE between Queens Chapel Rd NE and 24th Place NE

Clermont Dr. NE between Webster Street NE and Allison Street NE

Evarts Street NE between 30th Street NE and Bladensburg Rd NE

Fort Dr. NE between Half Place NE and 1st Street NE

Otis Place NW between Park Place NW and Warder Street NW

Taylor Street NE between 20th Street NE and 22nd Street NE

Ward 7

49th Place NE between Foote Street NE and Nannie Helen Burroughs Avenue NE

50th Place NE between Fitch Place NE and Dead End

51st Street NE between Fitch Place NE and Fitch Place NE

Fitch Place NE between 50th Place NE and 51st Street NE

Nannie Helen Burroughs Avenue NE between 51st Street NE and Division Avenue NE

Ward 8

1st Street SE between Danbury Street SE and Elmira Street SE

2nd Street SW between Xenia Street SW and Atlantic Street SW

4th Street SE between Atlantic Street SE and Brandywine Street SE

Brandywine Street SE between South Capitol Street SE and 1st Street SE

Xenia Street SE between Valley Avenue SE and Foxhall Place SE

Citywide Alley Restoration Projects

DDOT is improving alleys across the city. Once work begins, access to sections of the alley under construction will be temporarily closed, and parking will be restricted. In case of emergencies, access may be permitted by notifying DDOT. Work is estimated to take about two weeks, weather permitting.

Ward 1

Square No 0362: Alley bounded by Westminster Street NW, 10th Street NW, T Street NW, and 9th Street NW

Ward 2

Square No 0209: Alley bounded by P Street NW, 15th Street NW, Church Street NW, 14th Street NW

Ward 6

Square No 0936: Alley bounded by 9th Street NE, F Street NE, 10th Street NE, and Maryland Avenue NE

Square No 0937: Alley bounded by Maryland Avenue NE, 10th Street NE, D Street NE, and 9th Street NE

Square No 0959: Alley bounded by 11th Street NE, G Street NE, 10th Street NE, and H Street NE

Square No 1005: Alley bounded by Maryland Avenue NE, 12th Street NE, G Street NE, 13th Street NE,

Square No 1008: Alley bounded by 12th.St NE, 13th Street NE, Duncan Place NE, and 12th Street NE

Square No 1031: Alley bounded by Corbin Pl. NE, Tennessee Avenue NE, C Street NE, 13th Street NE

Ward 7

Square No 5689: Alley bounded by 33rd Street SE, Camden Street SE, 32nd Street SE, and Bangor Street SE

Citywide Guardrails and Impact Attenuators Upgrade and Repair

DDOT will conduct preventive maintenance and repair of guardrails and impact attenuators at the following locations over the next two weeks.

Ward 5

Montana Avenue NB at North of New York Avenue Right, NE

Ward 6

14th Street NB at the ramp and EB Maine Avenue SW

HOV I-395 NB at the ramp to NB 14th Street, SW

Mass Avenue EB & 4th Street SB at Entrance ramp to tunnel I-395 Left, NW

Southeast Blvd EB at East of 11th Street Left, SE

Ward 7

Anacostia Freeway NB at the ramp to WB Benning Rd, NE

Benning Rd EB at East of Oklahoma Avenue, NE

Ward 8

I-295 NB at Exit 4 ramp to Suitland Parkway, SE

I-295 NB at Exit 5 A ramp to WB SE Freeway, SE

I-295 SB of underpass Firth Sterling Avenue Right, SE

I-295 SB in the median before Exit 2B to South Capitol Street JBAB left, SE

South Capitol Street SB at South of Firth Sterling Avenue Right, SW

South Capitol Street SB on-ramp to SB I-295 Right, SE

Citywide Highway Structure Repair Projects

As part of DDOT's commitment to improving and restoring Highway Structures, preventive maintenance for bridges and other highway-related structures will occur at the following locations throughout the next two weeks.

Ward 1

T Street Over North Capital Street

Ward 3

Chain Bridge Over Potomac River

Theodore Roosevelt Bridge Over the Potomac River

Ward 4

14th Street Bridge (Southbound) Over Potomac River and Ohio Drive

Ward 6

9th Street Over I-395 SW

L'Enfant Plaza Bridge Over S.E Freeway

Southwest Freeway Over South Capitol Street

Ward 7

Benning Road Over Kenilworth Avenue and CSX

Ramp on Beginning Road Over Kenilworth Avenue Southbound

Minnesota Avenue Over East Capitol Street

If you live near any project areas, please remove your vehicles by the posted times and encourage your neighbors to do the same.
